H0.text: Where are the headquarters of Interpol. Paris

H1.text: Where are the headquarters of Interpol. Geneva

H2.text: Where are the headquarters of Interpol. The Hague

H3.text: Where are the headquarters of Interpol. Lyon

A4.text: Interpol is headquartered in Lyon, France, with seven regional bureaus worldwide, and a National Central Bureau in all 196 member states.

A5.text: Its new headquarters were established in Paris, then from 1967 in Saint-Cloud, a Parisian suburb. They remained there until 1989 when they were moved to their present location in Lyon.
